error.msg: The buffer 'buf' may not be null-terminated after the call to strncpy().
error.verbose: The buffer 'buf' may not be null-terminated after the call to strncpy(). If the source string's size fits or exceeds the given size, strncpy() does not add a zero at the end of the buffer. This causes bugs later in the code if the code assumes buffer is null-terminated.
